name: Hotel Extravaganza
description:
It's a hotel that a group of us made. There isn't really much at the moment, but if we decide to put more effort into this game, we can definitely make more out of this.

Tobey-Julian Joseph - Source Control, Modeler, Level Designer, Technical Artist

David Wu - Lead Programmer, Level Designer, Modular Asset Director

Shawn Flynn - Modeler, Level Designer, Texture Artist

Christian Gulick - Modeler, Level Designer, Texture Artist
